A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok I liked this film at first but in retrospect I haven’t been interested in seeing this film after my first view and when I force myself to see it again\, it’s a total bore. The problem with the film is the unnecessary journey taken to the casino island which is soo pointless. Also\, I wasn’t happy that the director\, Rian Johnson didn’t connect the events of the first movie to this one. We still don’t have Snokes or Rey’s backstories and for Gods sake\, why on earth would you make the greatest Jedi who ever lived act like a bratty child on the island and then kill him off at the end of the film? Terrible decisions by a terrible director made this one of the WORST Star Wars movies ever. I gave it 2 stars for the fight scene between Rey and Kyle against Snokes men.
